text: Abdelhadi Tazi (June 15, 1921 - April 2, 2015) was a Moroccan scholar, writer, historian and former Moroccan ambassador in many countries. He has worked with the Nationalist Movement. He has experienced exile and prison during his career. Tazi was born in Fes, Morocco. He died in Rabat, Morocco, aged 94.Abdelhadi Tazi, Member of Moroccoâ€™s Academy, dies at 94 ==Related pages== *List of historians by continent ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Moroccan politicians Category:Moroccan historians Category:Moroccan academics Category:Ambassadors of Morocco
